> He had those kinky stuffs like putting you in his underground basement
> He will accept your friends ( well seriously he will hunt them down )

Over all, He's just the perfect guy for you

一开始看一下介绍不太喜欢，一看这么多好评，买一个，还挺好玩。小心脏蹦蹦蹦跳，我是玩人类的，不过好像先玩tf不尽比较容易上手，我还是喜欢团队配合。值得一试的游戏，可惜国内因内容题材，所以不火，直播火一阵被禁所以人少，是好游戏。

“死亡不是解脱”
       每一位玩家 面对的是新的开始，也是新的噩梦，黎明杀机带给我们的不仅仅是紧张刺激感，更多的是我们对于人性的考验。
人类玩家可以选择团队合作，一起逃出生天；也可以单枪匹马与未知的杀手共同较量。每一局游戏的开始，都是无穷的未知，无穷的恐惧。
       杀手玩家可以暗中观察伺机行动，也可以横冲直撞无情杀戮。
BEHAVIOR公司深深的抓住了玩家的内心让玩家可以在这个小小的空间施展他们无限的才能，的确我们不可否认这款游戏的成功，他们对于玩家的服务与热情也在被我们深深的记在心里，从春节红衣到电击狂魔YYX（THE DOCTOR) 我们中国玩家无疑是他们最热爱的的对象之一。我想这也是黎明杀机一直被热爱的原因之一吧。
       游戏整体没有大问题，官方一直在为游戏优化而不懈努力（对于小作坊，我觉得他们已经很棒了）游戏乐趣极强（尤其是组队），可能对于萌新来说可能上手会较为困难。对于那些刚刚入手的玩家来说，坚持不懈是完好这款游戏的关键，对于每一款游戏都有从难到易的过程，请务必坚持游戏初期的漫长的几个小时。

请记住，队友不一定是你的后盾，木板不是你唯一的救命稻草。

我们迷雾里见:)
Jogo possui alguns erros, mas nada grave, e é mto legal de jogar com os amigos

oyunda çok fazla hack oyuncu mevcut o yüzden parasını haketmiyor tüm perkleri inceledim siz can basarken ve yerde yatarken ve koşarken ve katil 1 kişiyi hook astıgında görüyor belirli bir süre adam bu perklerin dışında görüyor adam hack açmış sürekli nereye saklanırsan sana geliyor ses çıkartmıyorum yaralı deilim hook da asılı kimse yok kısacası oyun çerezlik fazla bir beklenti içine girmeyin bu incelemeyi görseniz bile zaten yeterli iyi oynamanız için oyunda gerekli perkler Technician.Empathy.Iron Will.Self Care 4 perk kullanmanız sizi baya bir ilerletir oyunda ilk perkimiz teknisyen sizin jeneratör patlattığınız zaman bazen patlamasını engelliyor sesi katil duymuyor diger perkimiz empaty yani katil birini yaraladıgı zaman takım arkadaşınızı görüyorsunuz ve takım arkadaşınız yerde yatarken aurasını görüyorsunuz buda jeneratör yapmanıza olanak sağlıyor diger perkimiz ise iron will siz yaralandıgınız anda bir yerde saklanırken sizi katil duymuyor yaralı olunca karakteriniz sürekli ses çıkartıyor sesi engelliyor diger perkimiz self care kendi kendinize can basabiliyorsunuz oyundaki en şanslı karaktere gelelim perk olsun olmasın aşırı sanslı karakterdir herşeyden yırtabilirsiniz o kadar şanslıki Dwight Fairfield karakterimiz aşırı şanslı bir karakterdir bütün karakterlerden daha avantajlıdır dıştan kolay gözükse bile aşırı şanslı 5 maça girdiğimi biliyorum 5 indede kaçabildim ard arda o kadar şanslı fazla türk oyuncu yok zaten oynayan gelenlerde okullu akşam 8-10 demeden uyuyorlar adam 30 yaşına gelmiş okuyor siz düşünün siz siz olun kimseyi eklemeyin bu gençlik ölü kısacası yıl 2017 zeka yok kimsede eklemeyin mikrofonu yok bunuda geçtim ses ayarlarını bile yapamayacak kadar aciz bir gençlik var buna rağmen arada bir akıllı çıkar diye ekliyorum nafile boş işler

游戏我推不推荐，我推荐，平衡做的怎么样简直就是屎，尤其是那个上分系统简直是狗屎，低分段人类体验极差，高分段屠夫体验极差，好不容易拿个三杀，嘿，你猜怎么着都没升段，为什么，因为那把人类不救人，结果追逐分不够，挂的次数不够掉段了，我一个人好好的屠夫又不守尸，不救人也是我的错？随便一个车队分分钟修爆，绿段以上，走地你告诉我怎么玩，这就算了，唯一那么几个有尊严的屠夫先后挨砍，以前护士容错率中等，现在活生生大削，玲妹没配件直接拉马拉松有时候都追不上，我好歹也是个老玩家了，不能动不动就爆粗口，很久以前拿血点恶心我，现在过了几年拿平衡恶心我，打击防针对，怀表防守尸，一层健康换瞬起，修机速度加强，苹果削了，开个柜子还TM让人掀翻一脸，屠夫我就一个惨字不想多说，我玩了足够长的时间了也被恶心够了，没有我们这些屠夫你们人类跟谁皮，打了好几个赛季的红段越来越不想玩了，到了今年可太秀了走地压根都上不去了，我现在也玩人带个魂牵梦绕一顿蹲起多快乐，你追我，我能跟你玩5台机，就这么做的狗屎平衡

Is this game perfect? Of course not. Is this game a ton of fun? Absolutely. A large variety of killers, survivors, and perks to mix and match make this game replayable for hours and hours. After ~6 hours, it becomes less spooky and more about the mechanics. There are still moments that will scare the shit out of you, but playing with friends and hearing them scream as Michael Myers rounds a corner is priceless.

Игра хорошая, не надоедливая, играть приятно. Стоит своих денег. Но меня бесят дауны которые когда понимают что проиграют отключаються это относится как к выживым, так и к маньякам . Из-за таких даунов сливается ранг. Разроботчики решите это как нибудь и добавте наказание за такое!
很多人都说杀鸡，对萌新的游戏体验极差，但是我想说确实是这样，但是你不能否定这是一款好游戏，我听1000+小时的大佬说你玩100+的时候是你认识游戏，等你玩到500+的时候才是游戏刚认识你，这段时间很慢长，所以有很多人坚持不到那个时候，还没体验到游戏真正的乐趣就已经放弃了，你玩的时间久了玩人类溜屠夫给队友争取时间的时候，上了树队友救把命搭上的时候，这时候才是真正的游戏体验（极好）

Like any other game, it has a lot of bugs especially when the killer disconnects and you put on an offering but you cant retrieve it back cause you offered it in a disconnected game. Other problems are: You get kicked out of the game cause it says on your part that the killer disconnected but your friends spawned in the game. Its a new game for sure so hopefully yall fix this.
Edit: Prestiging isnt even worth it anymore, you lose all your items and good perks for trash perks in the end even though you have saved a lot of bloodpoints to make your perfect character. Devs need to look at this cause its upsetting, whats the point of prestiging if youre not gonna get anything good. at the same time it doesnt really say youre gonna get better perks or whatever. its just tilting. hopefully you guys fix the bloodweb ugly
买了没人玩是什么鬼

Dear Future Dead By Daylight Players

So this game is an extreme amount of fun from what I have played of it, somtimes. With your friends this game is great. With people online it's a real crapshoot. As a survivor you find hardly any trolls and for the killers that face camp it's only at the lower ranks (I'm considering 20 as low because it has, you know, lower skilled players) and even then I have not really seen it a whole lot of camping (DISCLAIMER. Big *** difference between face camping and patroling but more on that later) And the other survivors don't often block your esacpe from the killer. It's usally calm and cheery even with killers somtimes with everyone saying gg and good job and all that.

 BUT.....BIG FREAKING BUTT If you go as killer that's where the toxicity appears suddenly as you are frequented by low ranked veterans who only stay low to troll noob killers. Each match will probably have someone ranting how you were camping. This being you as a killer just standing in front of them not even moving untill they die (but as I said ranks higher than 19 don't do this because it gives the survivors SO MUCH TIME to get generators), but really ,as smarter killers tend to do, you were patrolling around the area of the hooked survivor However the most extruciating thing of all follows this set of patterns. Whenever you go into a new rank with a pip and think to your self ,"Well I got nuthin better to do let's see what kind of players are in the next rank", and then proceed to click to create lobby...... You will get chewed up spit out and pitied ,trolled, and worst of all........................ they still lose thier shit at you when you "camp. Even worse the killers all get shit perks *ahem* they get good perks at first but Devs quickly nerf them down because of the outcry of bitchy trolls and "Elitists" who play as survivors. I don't really know wether to recommend or not. It's great with friends with the gentleman's agreement to not use perks or at least not op ones, but that is it unless you like reading a book as your charecter fixes a generator and everyone else trolls the killer and you know there is almost no way you can die.



Afterthoughts
So overall dont come into this without friends. It's almost a requirement to practice with them as a killer if you don't want to chuck your computer at the wall in frustration. It's a great game and there are some really chill and friendly people in it, but as always the few shitheads who find no other enjoyment in life then sitting behind a screen ,wasting away to troll others who ,as they say, sit behind a screen and waste away.

I hope this was informative, and I sincerely hope that my expierience as a killer main was just an unlucky one and not reflective of the expierience of others. Particularly the killers.

Signed
Some chick with a moustache


P.S.
Once again I fervently urge you to buy this game with others or at least know some people who already have it so you can play and have fun as both survivor and killer.

simple game with simple rules, yet highly addicting and challenging!

play as a killer or one of the survivors.

play it smart and win the game!
Dead by Daylight has to be one of the most engaging horror title I've ever played.

Normally I never make a review, but this game is an exception. Early in its release I joined and LOVED the shit out of this game. Had its ups and downs but I loved it, and still do! If I could fucking play it. Shortly after the release of the hag there was a major bug where the game was seriously unreliable and would crash and give a DBD error. Since then i have NEVER played a single game to the end because of this fucking bug, i still have paid for the full game and DLC and yet still no fucking fix. And yet they still continue to make NEW content rather than fixing the old bugs which not just me, but thousands of others still struggle with. For me this game is UNPLAYABLE. I seriously wouldnt risk it tbh.
i cant playplease helppp

Absolutely LOVE, LOVE THIS GAME! I have been playing other assymetric survival games, like friday the 13th, for awhile now and only recently discovered Dead by Daylight from watching streamers like TydeTyme play it. I was skeptical at first, only because it seemed just like all the others, but once i played it, i was HOOKED! Unlike dead by Daylight, other assymetric survival games became quickly monotonous, routine, and predictable, even with new DLCs. I got bored very quickly. Also, alot of hese games were too slow paced and focused mainly on getting kills/surviving, and didnt necessarily require stragety, tactics, and teamwork. This game alwyas brings something new and exicting to the table and I have a different, yet good experience everytime I play. I like the fact that there are several ways to win, and even if you dont win, there are ways you could still earn points and achievements, as well as helping out your team. I have been playing for a few weeks now and I am really looking forward ot unleashing the full potential this game has to offer. 

Developers, keep up the great work! but please, dont nerf freddy lol hes balanced perfectly in my opinion. People just need to learn to adapt and work together better. 

Thank you for making such a great game.
-Christopher

This game has been very unbalanced since day one.
Specifically in the survivors favor.
The devs in my opinion are very incompetent i could go on an entire rant but ill make this short.
The generators get done too fast at rank 1 and other ranks sometimes only letting you have a game that literally lasts for 3-5 minutes. Hexes are garbage dont bother using them. Not only can they be disabled at the begginning of the round but hex ruin can STILL be powered through. They are not hidden and survivors can easily disable them with no skill checks.
Next trash killers.
Im glad they are fixing the wraith but freddy didn't need these nerfs.
They made trash even trashier and fire up doesnt do anything either its a terrible perk.
There is no reason in buying the nightmare on elm street DLC unless you want a killer you will be harrassed with at rank 1.
I honestly think they listen way too much to the survivors that are terrible or dont understand this game.
Just like many other games like DARK SOULS 3 the devs listen to the players and make a very unbalanced game.
ILL MAKE THIS CLEAR.
RELY ON NUMBERS NOT PEOPLES COMPLIANTS IF YOU HAVE EVER DONE THAT THEN YOU WILL REALIZE HOW UNFAIR THIS GAME IS.
I honestly think the devs dont play this game. (im not refferring to not_queen.)
otimo jogo,so que tem alguns bugs.

Dieses Game ist so schlecht ausbalanciert, das es einfach keinen Spaß mehr macht.

Ich werde mir wohl ein anderes Spiel suchen müssen.

Des weiteren ist es den Entwicklern wohl schlichtweg egal ob Personen in diesem Spiel Cheaten, da ich die betreffenden Spieler immer wieder zu sehen bekomme.

Fazit: 
*******
- Schlechter Service
- Schlechte Balance zwischen Killer und Überlebenden
- 0% Support!
Overall a great game. There are some glitches but nothing major.

[h1]ESTE JUEGO ES INJUGABLE.[/h1]
En más de la mitad de las partidas, el killer se va a aprovechar de una mecánica, la cual los devs se niegan a nerfear. Estoy hablando de [spoiler]FACE-CAMPEAR AL PRIMER DESGRACIADO QUE PONGAN EN UN GANCHO[/spoiler]

El juego está rotísimo y los devs no tienen ni idea de como balancearlo. Al punto de que no tiene ni gracia jugarlo.

Ojalá me estuviera refiriendo al hecho de que buffearon a todos los killers en general o que nerfearon un montón de perks de supervivientes. Eso es lo de menos... Buffearon campear y tunnelear, (destruyendo Decisive Strike y reduciendo el tiempo que los asesinos se realentizan luego de dar un golpe).

Registré estadísticas de mis últimas 62 partidas como superviviente y los resultados fueron:

Kill rate: 80.24%
4 kills games: 59.68% 
Camp rate: 77.41%
Tunnel rate: 85.48%

Repair rate: 65.81%
Survivor rage quit: 10.22%
Door escapes: 25.81%
Hatch escapes: 12.90%

Por este motivo nadie quiere jugar de superviviente. Es una experiencia de mierda.

Actualmente el juego se basa en:
- Esperar una eternidad para encontrar partida de asesino y divertirte.
- Insta-encontrar partida como superviviente, sufrir miserablemente y al final, leer a un tipo cagándose de risa e insultando en portugués porque perdiste contra él face campeando a 4 personas.

No gastes ni medio dolar en esta basura.

Honest opinion. Devs dont even test their patches anymore. Every patch gets worse about freddy. not just nerfhammer, bugs after bugs. They mentioned in stream 3sec timer shouldnt be additive. it should reset everytime you put someone in sleep now you cant put someone in sleep at all during 3 sec.

They have no clue what they just added to their game.
